overdrive.issue: Rundowns will not load to Overdrive
steps: Close all Overdrive programs (Rundown Control and Direct Control)
Open the overdrive server from the desktop
Login - username: user password: password
To go Tools > Services
Press Stop for all 4 options. Wait until all switch to stop and the stop buttons are greyed out.
Press the start button on each service. Best to do one at a time. Wait until all lights are green.
Close Web interface.
Launch Rundown Control and Direct Control. Make sure all lights are green.
Try loading rundowns
overdrive.notes: Entire process should take less than 10 minutes. Be patient while stopping and starting the services. It may take a minute after you press the start and/or stop button.

steps: Go to Rundown Control
Select Tools from the top menu
Select Reload Custom Controls
Or press F9
overdrive.notes: You would also do this if any custom controls are appearing red in a overdrive shot.

overdrive.issue: Device swap for a lost of server channel
steps: Go to the upper right corner of Rundown Control
Select the blue icon that says Device Swap
Select the tab that says Device Sway
Pick the Brio channel you would like to swap out

vinten.issue: No control of a camera on the touch screen or joystick
steps: Select the camera you can not move on the controller
On the camera touchscreen, select Opts in the bottom right corner
Select Enable
vinten.notes: This process takes about 45 seconds.  Stay patient.

steps: Close out the Vinten touchscreen program
Reopen the progam
Select Robo Operator
Load the camera shots from the News file
Resave the shot over the green thumbnail

switchPCRs.title: Switch from one PCR to another
directorSteps: In Dalet, un-mos all needed rundowns for the bad control room.
In the good control room - open Rundown Control and Direct Control
Mos on the rundowns for the control you are in.
Run the Salvo on the router
Vinten - make sure services are started
